Patients receive schedule chemotherapy regimen contain doxorubicin schedule oral 5 hydroxytryptamine 3 receptor antagonist antiemetic ( ondansetron , granisetron , tropisetron , dolasetron mesylate ) combine dexamethasone day 1 .
